title: Connect to the internet ANYWHERE! - SpaceX Starlink
description: Check out the Govee Immersion TV Backlight at   Satellite internet isn't new, but Starlink is looking to provide internet speeds that are almost as good as your current provider but the ideal use is to connect people who don't have access to broadband due to living remotely.  Check out Starlink at   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
